wikipedia_page.main: Willie Rae (born 16 June 1924) is a Scottish footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. Rae played junior football for Petershill before joining Rangers in 1945. He played in 131 league matches for Rangers before moving to Queen of the South in 1956.

response: * Sir William Rae, 3rd Baronet (1769–1842), Scottish Lawyer and Member of Parliament
* William Rae (English footballer), English footballer who played for Glossop North End F.C. in 1901
* William Rae (Hamilton), Scottish footballer who played for Hamilton Academical F.C.
